faq.q1: What skill level do I need for your tours?
faq.a1: We offer tours for all skill levels, from beginners to expert riders. Each tour clearly indicates its difficulty level, and our guides will ensure you're matched with an appropriate adventure.
faq.q2: What's included in the tour price?
faq.a2: All tours include motorcycle rental, protective gear, professional guide, fuel, accommodations (for multi-day tours), and meals as specified in each tour description.
faq.q3: Do I need my own motorcycle?
faq.a3: No, we provide high-quality enduro motorcycles suitable for off-road terrain. However, if you prefer to bring your own bike, please contact us to discuss arrangements.
faq.q4: What should I bring on a tour?
faq.a4: We recommend bringing comfortable riding clothes, sturdy boots, sunscreen, personal medications, and a sense of adventure! We provide all necessary riding gear.
faq.a5: Free cancellation up to 14 days before the tour. 50% refund for cancellations 7-14 days before. No refund for cancellations less than 7 days before departure.
faq.a6: Most tours run from spring to autumn. Some destinations offer year-round riding. Check individual tour dates for availability.
